original_text: And when they measured it by the omer, the one who gathered much did not have too much, and the one who gathered little did not have too little. Everyone had gathered just as much as they needed.
korean_text: 오멜로 되어 본즉 많이 거둔 자도 남음이 없고 적게 거둔 자도 부족함이 없이 각 사람은 먹을 만큼만 거두었더라

sentences.original_text: And when they measured it by the omer
the one who gathered much did not have too much
sentences.korean_translation: 많이 모은 사람은 너무 많이 갖지 않았고

sentences.original_text: and the one who gathered little did not have too little
sentences.korean_translation: 적게 모은 사람은 너무 적게 갖지 않았다

sentences.original_text: Everyone had gathered just as much as they needed
